ComicInfo.Title: Tales from the Haunted Jazz Club
ComicInfo.Summary: Red Wraith recounts three tall tales of love and mutilation. An incompetent doctor performs surgery on his beloved wife, a beatnik learns that sexual inexperience, marijuana and sharp instruments make a dangerous mix, and a woman with morbid fear of human hair discovers that a bald body can still be hairy inside.
